name: Woke Alone
description:
A 3D Action/Aventure stealth game made for the Global Game Jam 2019 theme: What home means to you.

You wake up in a strange place that reminds you of your past. Your goal is to reach the end of the dream. In order to achieve that, you need to find certain items that can help you unlocking new areas. But careful, there are a lot of enemies waiting to catch you. You will need to use stealth and turn the lights on to kill the enemies.

Only available in Spanish.
